name: Curriculum Development
description: PEP provides curriculum & training for educators that focuses on Filipina/o American culture. The Pin@y (Pinay/Pinoy) Educational Partnerships (PEP) is a service-learning/learning-service program that forms a “triangular partnership” between the university, public schools, and the community to cultivate a barangay (community) to produce critical educators and curriculum at all levels of education and in the community. This takes place at Balboa High School, Longfellow Elementary School, James De

howToGetIt: Please call mainline for more information about this service. Go to this link for 2024-2025 PEP Teacher Application: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfLYls8kc1rBLFHuGngyLPgR2bmOGE98P6ncD4PYMurilOvMQ/viewform Apply for scholarship using this link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSepUezBhLVx-XIfp1P9mpBqQqtVp8IX9K23ZFabkKCSzRQylA/viewform
